detaileddescription.para:
Resolution in mV per Digit
values 1

the minimim accepted intensity. smaller insensity values are to be ignored
values 1

CAND TDIAG_START_TIME in ms.
value 500ms

K_CentAND_CYCLETIME: Alarm should only throw one single event.
value 0 - > this isn't possible for EB OS therefore the time is set to 1 sec in order to save cpu load

low voltage threshold range for NWDF: 9,4V -> 9400[mV].
value 9400/K_ANA_RESOLUTION_MV_PER_DIGIT

high voltage threshold for NWDF: 17,0V -> 17000[mV].
value 17000/K_ANA_RESOLUTION_MV_PER_DIGIT

low voltage threshold range for NWDF: 9,9V -> 9900[mV].
value 9900/K_ANA_RESOLUTION_MV_PER_DIGIT

range for the exeption handling (high) 16,5V -> 16500[mV].
value 16500/K_ANA_RESOLUTION_MV_PER_DIGIT

default states for initialization of TCentAND_States.
{0u,0u,0u,0u}

KL15 is On.
values 0x01u
holds the status of Master algo states, contains active and inactive states TE_CNAD_MasterState.
holds the status of the startvorgang state of the Master state machine,contains active and inactive states TE_CNAD_Startvorgang.
holds the states of the voltage exception.
holds the states of the KL15 state machine.
holds the states of the Slave state machine.
holds the status of Master algo states, contains active and inactive states TE_CNAD_MasterState.
holds the status of the startvorgang state of the Master state machine,contains active and inactive states TE_CNAD_Startvorgang.
holds the states of the voltage exception.
holds the states of the KL15 state machine.
holds the states of the Slave state machine.
Holds the data required to handle the CAND module,It allows to access and modify the data related to CAND.

export trigger of IRQ for AI_UBATT in case of voltage drop below 6V
values 0-255 unit N/A resolution N/A context called by function CentAND_Master. protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Don't cancel the alarm that if it is not started , Canceling an alarm not previously started will result in an OS error
values True (1) - False (0) unit N/A resolution N/A context called by function CentAND_TaskFunc,CentAND_SlaveState_KL15Off,CentAND_SlaveState_NetDiagInactive,CentAND_Stop,. protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

Structure containing all the data for CAND.
values Holds 9 different states unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.

voltage state initialised.
values 0 - 1 unit N/A resolution N/A context task protection none storage class normal ram
Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
Here we defines the standard interface for the CentAND_Signal.

standard interface Setup Function setup function that initialises when the startmode is WARMSTART
reentrant No context called from thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
ModulIdentifier
ModulIdentifier - Module identifier. [in] Startmode Startmode of the gateway.
TRUE On sucess or FALSE otherwise Globals
None Call Sequence
Activity diagram of the function "CentAND_Setup"
Verification criteria
Change the Startmode and check the Behaviour. Test Method
This function can be verified using the following test method: Equivalence class analysis (test of representative values from input range) TEST_CentAND_Setup
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helperfunction. No requirements are satisfied. Setup function that initialises when the startmode is WARMSTART.

standard interface StartStop Function , starts or stops the Cent task depending upon the task status.
reentrant No context task context thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance
Not Security-Relevant.
Notify
Notify - Start notification.
FALSE always. Globals
None Call Sequence
Activity diagram of the function "CentAND_StartStop"
Verification criteria
Change the notify,state and check the return. Test Method
This function can be verified using the following test method: Equivalence class analysis (test of representative values from input range) TEST_CentAND_StartStop
Traceability
Design Decision - Justification. Helperfunction. No requirements are satisfied. Starts or Stops the CentAND_Task DiagTask depending upon the task status.

standard interface Alive Function.
reentrant No context task context thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous Security Relevance

TRUE always. Globals

Traceability

init function of the CAND module, It initialises the variables with default values from ROM.

start function for CentAND_module. initialize all output_values by ROM- default_values and distribute it into the system. It sets the base alarm of the CentAND_module and also starts the network diagnosis.

event driven task that evaluates and calculates CAND purposes. It starts or stops the CentAND_module based on the event obtained from OS. Further, also activates the slave or master state machine accordingly.

simplesect.para: reentrant No context : task thread safe Yes multicore safe No - All APIs needs to be called from the same core synchronous

simplesect.title: Security Relevance
simplesect.para: Not Security-Relevant.
void

simplesect.title: Globals
simplesect.para: CentAND_TDiagStartExceededAlarm_active - cancel the alarm that if it is not started .Canceling an alarm not previously started will result will set an OS error .

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Change the event,alarm and check the return value.

simplesect.title: Test Method
simplesect.para: This function can be verified using the following test method: Equivalence class analysis (test of representative values from input range) TEST_CentAND_TaskFunc

simplesect.title: Traceability
simplesect.para: It satisfies the following DOORS Requirements: {SWR_ICAS1_GW_1659; SWR_ICAS1_GW_1660}

detaileddescription.para: This functions sets the state of the voltage exception. It shall set the VoltageState to E_CENT_ACT_ND_VOLTAGE_EXCEPTION in order to avoid that during a fail the nwdf is activated again till drop is over .

briefdescription.para: Handles Activation or deactivation of Network Diagnosis based the Flag set.

simplesect.title: Verification criteria
simplesect.para: Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases.
